ANNUAL SPRING SALE & DEMO WEEKEND
April 26 & 27, 2008
Saturday 9am - 6pm
Sunday 10am - 5pm
The shop will be CLOSED, Friday, April 25th for sale set-up.

The Sale:
Our famous spring sale is held in Collinsville at our shop on the
Farmington River.
Collinsville Canoe & Kayak has the best selection of in-stock boats in New England, from the latest in recreational and touring boats, to the hottest new whitewater designs. Hundreds of boats will be on sale. Our annual spring sale offers great prices on boats and on our huge selection of paddling accessories. The manufacturers? representatives and our knowledgeable staff will be here to answer your questions, help you test paddle and help you make the best choice possible.
Come early for the best selection.

Consignment Boats:
We are more than happy to sell boats on consignment for our customers during our sales. However, due to the logistics involved, we ask that a few simple guidelines are followed.
Consignment boats will be accepted Tuesday, April 22 through Thursday, April 24, from 10am - 5pm, and must be picked up by Sunday evening, April 27 at 5pm if they do not sell. We keep 10% of the sale price if you want store credit or 30% if you would like a check. We are happy to assist you in pricing your boat fairly. We?ve had an excellent success rate with consignment sales, so please feel free to take advantage of it. Sorry, we cannot accept kit, folding boats or accessories. Please bring boats clean and ready to sell. We reserve the right to turn away boats that are unsafe, worn out or dirty.
There is a non-refundable $5 (cash) handling fee per boat.
